mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.ACCOUNT_CODE as accountCode, a.SYMBOL as symbol, a.SEC_TYPE as secType, a.CURRENCY as currency, a.EXCHANGE as exchange, a.EXEC_ID as execId, a.ORDER_ID as orderId, a.SIDE as side, a.PRICE as price, a.SHARES as shares, a.AVG_PRICE as avgPrice, a.EXEC_TIME as execTime, a.REMARK as remark, a.CREATE_DATE as createDate, a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_TRADE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_CODE , SYMBOL , SEC_TYPE , CURRENCY , EXCHANGE , EXEC_ID , ORDER_ID , SIDE , PRICE , SHARES , AVG_PRICE , EXEC_TIME , REMARK , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{accountCode} , #{symbol} , #{secType} , #{currency} , #{exchange} , #{execId} , #{orderId} , #{side} , #{price} , #{shares} , #{avgPrice} , #{execTime} , #{remark} , #{createDate} , #{updateDate} )

INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_TRADE
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
ACCOUNT_CODE ,
SYMBOL ,
SEC_TYPE ,
CURRENCY ,
EXCHANGE ,
EXEC_ID ,
ORDER_ID ,
SIDE ,
PRICE ,
SHARES ,
AVG_PRICE ,
EXEC_TIME ,
REMARK ,
CREATE_DATE ,
UPDATE_DATE

#{accountId} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_TRADE
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
ACCOUNT_CODE = #{accountCode} ,
SYMBOL = #{symbol} ,
SEC_TYPE = #{secType} ,
CURRENCY = #{currency} ,
EXCHANGE = #{exchange} ,
EXEC_ID = #{execId} ,
ORDER_ID = #{orderId} ,
SIDE = #{side} ,
PRICE = #{price} ,
SHARES = #{shares} ,
AVG_PRICE = #{avgPrice} ,
EXEC_TIME = #{execTime} ,
REMARK = #{remark} ,
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} ,
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO IB_ACCOUNT_TRADE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_CODE , SYMBOL , SEC_TYPE , CURRENCY , EXCHANGE , EXEC_ID , ORDER_ID , SIDE , PRICE , SHARES , AVG_PRICE , EXEC_TIME , REMARK , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.accountCode} , #{item.symbol} , #{item.secType} , #{item.currency} , #{item.exchange} , #{item.execId} , #{item.orderId} , #{item.side} , #{item.price} , #{item.shares} , #{item.avgPrice} , #{item.execTime} , #{item.remark} , #{item.createDate} , #{item.updateDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_TRADE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , ACCOUNT_CODE = #{item.accountCode} , SYMBOL = #{item.symbol} , SEC_TYPE = #{item.secType} , CURRENCY = #{item.currency} , EXCHANGE = #{item.exchange} , EXEC_ID = #{item.execId} , ORDER_ID = #{item.orderId} , SIDE = #{item.side} , PRICE = #{item.price} , SHARES = #{item.shares} , AVG_PRICE = #{item.avgPrice} , EXEC_TIME = #{item.execTime} , REMARK = #{item.remark} , CREATE_DATE = #{item.createDate} , UPDATE_DATE = #{item.updateDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE IB_ACCOUNT_TRADE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , ACCOUNT_CODE = #{accountCode} , SYMBOL = #{symbol} , SEC_TYPE = #{secType} , CURRENCY = #{currency} , EXCHANGE = #{exchange} , EXEC_ID = #{execId} , ORDER_ID = #{orderId} , SIDE = #{side} , PRICE = #{price} , SHARES = #{shares} , AVG_PRICE = #{avgPrice} , EXEC_TIME = #{execTime} , REMARK = #{remark} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM IB_ACCOUNT_TRADE a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
